content: at lifting chains round 2 3 chain 1 double_crochet 1 double_crochet-increase x5 1 slip_stitch at lifting chains round 3-4 2 rounds 3 chain 15 double_crochet 1 slip_stitch at lifting chains round 5 3 chain 1 double_crochet 2 double_crochet crochet together x5 1 slip_stitch at lifting chains round 6 3 chain 10 double_crochet 1 slip_stitch at lifting chains close hole with 5 single_crochet leave a long tail to sew 5 design sew muzzle to main part and fill it with fiberfill as you sew cut out 2 white felt rounds about 15-20 mm and attach button or you can use other eyes sew eyes to main part as you like embroider nose with brown thread sew ears to main part 6 your puppy eyeglasses holder is ready good crocheting 7 copyright you are welcome to sell your finished items however you like but please do not copy and/or redistribute this pattern including translations to other languages if you have some questions comments wishes please contact with me  message at this site www nustyua/etsy com  e-mail nustyhm@gmail com  viber +380632105943  instagram @crochet nustyua best regards victoria 8
